description: NZXT expands the HALE82 series with a brand new non modular power supply for PC enthusiast and gamers. This power supply is the first among others to pioneer 2013 ErP Lot 6 Energy Star standard which will reduce vampire power by 50%, decreasing your energy consumption. In addition, HALE82 N is 80Plus Bronze certified and provides the best cost to performance ratio. Designed with high attention to detail, HALE82 N's internal board possess a stylish white and black interior design exclusive to NZXT. This does not only look great but also improves performance. A strong single +12V rail design to power up high-end graphic cards without brown-out. The intelligent fan speed control is ideal for users that operate in silent or performance modes. Available in 3 different wattages: 550 to 750watts to meet any mid to high PC configurations.
title: NZXT Hale82N 550W 80 Plus Bronze Active 240-Pin Non-modular Power Supply, Black np-1bn-0550a-us
